Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Happy
Speaker.line1: I think the tea is ready!

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: My pleasure, Mr. and Miss Hartington.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (Should I warn them about the bomb before leaving?)

Choices.Choice2: Only tell them to be careful

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: I heard about a bomb threat from the news.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Please be careful, both of you.
Speaker.line2: Especially since you're traveling without adult supervision.
Speaker.line3: You might become targets for bad people.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: You two should be cautious when traveling off the Express.
Speaker.line2: There's a lot happening in the country right now.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line2: You are talking about the bomb threat?

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Happy
Speaker.line2: We have nothing to do with them anyway.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line1: You can leave now, Mr. Waiter.
Speaker.line2: Eve must be hungry by now.
